item.title: [GLOBAL][Web Hosting] - Addons incident notification
item.description:
Oct 14, 12:55 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 10/10/2024 12:30 UTC
End time : 14/10/2024 12:51 UTC
Service impact : Customers who subscribed to Web Hosting services between 10/10/2024 and 14/10/2024 weren't obtaining the add-ons (CDN, MX, One click module).
Root cause : Software issue
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.
We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Oct 14, 08:18 UTC
Identified - Start time : 10/10/2024 12:30 UTC
Service impact : Customers who subscribed to Web Hosting services between 10/10/2024 and 14/10/2024 weren't obtaining the add-ons (CDN, MX, One click module).
Since 14/10/2024 07:45 UTC, customers who subscribe to Web Hosting services will be getting the add-ons (CDN, MX, One click module).
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working on a fix for customers impacted between 10/10/2024 and 14/10/2024.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [FR][VoIP] - SIP configuration update notification
item.description:
Oct 10, 19:33 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 9, 08:39 UTC
Update - There is the complete list of OVHcloud prefixes, registered at ARCEP https://extranet.arcep.fr/uploads/MAJPORTA.csv : 10021, 10133 , 84025 , 84268 , 90002

Oct 9, 07:52 UTC
Update - Half of the update has been completed.
50% of incoming calls are concerned by this update.

Next update 10/10/2024 17H00 UTC

Oct 8, 19:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 2, 13:29 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VoIP offer.


Start time : 08/10/2024 19:00 UTC
End time : 10/10/2024 20:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our policy of continuous improvement, we are carrying out maintenance on our carrier SIP.
An individual communication will be sent.


Here is an example of the configuration before and after this maintenance.
Inbound calls routed with the porta prefix 10021 will keep the prefix.
Non ported number and calls routed without prefix will stay as before.


Before :
INVITE sip:+33123456789@IP;user=phone SIP/2.0
To: <tel:+33123456789>


After :
INVITE sip:+3310021123456789@IP;user=phone SIP/2.0
To: <tel:+3310021123456789 >


Thank you for your understanding.

Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our WebPass offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 09/10/2024 17:00 UTC
End time : 09/10/2024 18:00 UTC
Service impact : At one point, a short downtime of no more than 10 minutes will be experienced. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release an underlying software upgrade. All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.description:
Oct 1, 18:02 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 1, 16:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 1, 10:58 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 01/10/2024 16:00 UTC
End time : 01/10/2024 18:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade. Our partner will be performing a routine maintenance to optimize performance service on Accounts. This maintenance is expected to impact performance for Accounts services, including the Console, User Accounting, Provisioning and Billing, although, services will remain available at all times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on account service. This maintenance is expected to not have impact on the projects: no downtime, no performance issue are expected.
